title: Key Fragments
body: Is it just me or has the key fragments been harder to get? I dont think ive gotten a key fragment for like 2 weeks now...

replies.body: I can't say I've noticed key fragments being harder to get lately, but it's likely tied to the honour reset. The higher rank honour you are the more you get key fragments (as far as I know) so with honour being reset most people would be getting them slower for a while until those ranks go up again :)
2 weeks, i haven't received one for  4 months, get over it...
